title: Drawing, "Design for a Punch Goblet", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and black ink, green color pencil, graphite on cream tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink at lower center: "GOBELET A PUNCH;" at lower right: "JEAN PUIFORCAT/44;" in graphite at upper right: "279+."
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description:
Flaring bowl with one applied band at rim raised on an inverted flaring foot with rim band of another material indicated in green color pencil connecting bowl and foot. To the left of bowl rim, profile section in graphite depicting protruding band.
Puiforcat fabrication #:
